SELECT ub.id,ub.link_id AS linkId,ub.pm,ub.title,ub.category,ub.type,ub.number,ub.balance,ub.mark,ub.status,ub.create_time AS createTime,ub.update_time AS updateTime,u.nickname,ub.uid FROM eb_user_bill ub LEFT JOIN eb_user u ON ub.uid = u.uid where ub.category = 'now_money'
and ( ub.uid like #{keywords} or u.nickname like #{keywords, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and (ub.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime})
ORDER BY ub.id DESC,ub.create_time DESC
